bug.author: shantanuchhabra
bug.summary: Typing in + or - anywhere in the UI zooms in/out
bug.description:
macOS 10.14 Python 3.6 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14062641/53988627-cbee0c80-40d8-11e9-87c3-7c7478dc6637.png></denchmark-link>
This is an unexpected experience since my annotation labels could have + or - in them and that would trigger this as well.
